Articles.Content: I\'m just wondering if there will be multiplayer? It would add a lot to the game.

What kind of multiplayer? Like an MMO style where everyone is connected? or are you thinking of like individual servers maybe with just a few friends or whatever? It would be interesting to see multiplayer for sure.
Nobody knows. Please, use the search bar to look, as the term 'multiplayer' is in a bajillion topics. That\'s the best answer I can tell you.

What kind of multiplayer? Like an MMO style where everyone is connected? or are you thinking of like individual servers maybe with just a few friends or whatever? It would be interesting to see multiplayer for sure.

Individual servers.

This topic has been discussed a large amount already, it would be appreciated if you would use the forum search functionality to ensure you do not post a topic which has been covered many times before.

The chief developer mentions this topic in his IRC interview, I would advise checking this out. In short, it will not be coming in the near future.

Thanks,

Rich
